name: Update file used by Blizzard games such as World of Warcraft and Diablo III; contains information used for patching the game software and required for the game to patch and update properly; saved in a binary format in the root directory of the game installation
summary: Update file used by Blizzard games such as World of Warcraft and Diablo III; contains information used for patching the game software and required for the game to patch and update properly; saved in a binary format in the root directory of the game installation.
